case.title: living w friends or relatives? - 42 (binghamton)
case.text: looking for a new start? willing to leave the city and start fresh? I am looking for someone to move in and help with the bills and minding the children 3 total ages 19,12,7...bilingual Hispanic bbw 220 lbs 42 yo looking to try something out! not the prettiest flower in the bunch but I cook well I am clean and articulate. I can sew and everything. lol
